Vovsoft Read Mode is a reading mode application for your desktop or laptop PC. It removes everything that is unnecessary and present only the text. You can make blog posts, articles and webpages clean and easy to read.

Vovsoft Read Mode is a reading mode application for your desktop or laptop PC. It removes everything that is unnecessary and present only the text. You can make blog posts, articles and webpages clean and easy to read.

Paste them into this software for better reading. You can configure the software with 3 predefined style options: Dark, Light and Sephia. You can print the refined text, read aloud or save as WAV for later listening. You can display any document in full-screen or windowed mode, Read Mode adjusts text according to your screen size. The software makes long chunks of text easier to read. All you need to do is copy and paste any text into the Read Mode software.

Key Features:
* Color options: Black, White, Dark, Sephia, Linen
* Full screen view
* Adjustable width
* Import from URL
* Read aloud (Automatic Text-to-Speech)
* Save as WAV file
